snippet: Medea Benjamin, a leader of the Code Pink protest group, said she was assaulted by the authorities while she was trying to travel to Gaza.
abstract: Medea Benjamin, co-founder of American anti-millitary protest group Code Pink, says she was detained in Cairo airport and assaulted by Egyptian police while trying to travel to Gaza for a meeting opposing the Israeli occupation there.
lead_paragraph: Medea Benjamin, a leader of the Code Pink protest group, said she was assaulted by the authorities while she was trying to travel to Gaza.

headline.main: U.S. Activist Says Egyptian Police Assaulted Her
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Protest Leader Says Police Assaulted Her
